original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañha
analyzed: meṇḍakapañha

original: Santhavavagga
analyzed: santhava vagga

original: 3. Buddhaappābādhapañha
“Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena bhāsitam petam bhagavatā

original: ‘ahamasmi, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇo yācayogo sadā payatapāṇi antimadehadharo anuttaro bhisakko sallakatto’ti.
analyzed: aham asmi bhikkhave brāhmaṇaḥ yāca yogaḥ sadā payata pāṇi antima deha dharaḥ anuttaraḥ bhisakkaḥ sallakatto ti

original: Puna ca bhaṇitaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: punar ca bhaṇitam bhagavatā

original: ‘etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ appābādhānaṁ yadidaṁ bākulo’ti.
analyzed: etat agga bhikkhave mama sāvakānam bhikkhūnam appa ābādhānam yat idam bākula uti

original: Bhagavato ca sarīre bahukkhattuṁ ābādho uppanno dissati.
analyzed: bhagavato ca sarīre bahu kkhattum ābādhaḥ uppanno dissati

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, tathāgato anuttaro, tena hi ‘etadaggaṁ …pe…
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena tathāgataḥ anuttaraḥ tena hi etat aggam pe

original: bākulo’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
analyzed: yam tam micchā

original: Yadi thero bākulo appābādhānaṁ aggo, tena hi ‘ahamasmi …pe…
analyzed: yadi theraḥ bākulaḥ aggo tena hi aham asmi pe

original: sallakatto’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
analyzed: vacanam micchā

original: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi ubhatas koṭikaḥ pañho tava anuppatto saḥ tayā nibbāhitabbaḥ ti

original: “Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā

original: ‘ahamasmi …pe…
analyzed: aham asmi pe

original: sallakatto’ti, bhaṇitañca—
analyzed: bhaṇitam ca

original: ‘etadaggaṁ …pe…
analyzed: etat aggam pe

original: bākulo’ti, tañca pana bāhirānaṁ āgamānaṁ adhigamānaṁ pariyattīnaṁ attani vijjamānataṁ sandhāya bhāsitaṁ.
analyzed: tat ca pana bāhirānam āgamānam adhigamānam pariyattīnam attani vijjamāna tam sandhāya

original: Santi kho pana, mahārāja, bhagavato sāvakā ṭhānacaṅkamikā, te ṭhānena caṅkamena divārattiṁ
analyzed: santi kho pana mahā rāja bhagavato sāvakāḥ ṭhāna caṅkamikā te ṭhānena caṅkamena divāratti

original: vītināmenti, bhagavā pana, mahārāja, ṭhānena caṅkamena nisajjāya sayanena divārattiṁ
analyzed: bhagavā pana mahā rāja ṭhānena caṅkamena nisajjāya sayanena divāratti

original: vītināmeti, ye te, mahārāja, bhikkhū ṭhānacaṅkamikā, te tena aṅgena atirekā.
analyzed: vītināma iti ye te mahā rāja bhikkhū ṭhāna caṅkamikā te tena aṅgena atirekā

original: Santi kho pana, mahārāja, bhagavato sāvakā ekāsanikā, te jīvitahetupi dutiyaṁ bhojanaṁ
analyzed: santi kho pana mahā rāja bhagavato sāvakāḥ eka āsanikā te dutiyam

original: na bhuñjanti, bhagavā pana, mahārāja, dutiyampi yāva tatiyampi bhojanaṁ bhuñjati,
analyzed: na bhuñjanti bhagavā pana mahā rāja dutiyam pi yāva tatiyam pi bhojanam bhuñjati

original: ye te, mahārāja, bhikkhū ekāsanikā, te tena aṅgena atirekā, anekavidhāni, mahārāja,
analyzed: ye te mahā rāja bhikkhū ekāsanikā te tena aṅgena atirekāḥ anekavidhāni mahā rāja

original: tāni kāraṇāni tesaṁ tesaṁ taṁ taṁ sandhāya bhaṇitāni.
analyzed: tāni kāraṇāni tesam tesam tam tam sandhāya bhaṇitāni

original: Bhagavā pana, mahārāja, anuttaro sīlena samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanena
analyzed: bhagavā pana mahā rāja anuttaraḥ sīlena samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyāḥ vimutti ñāṇa dassanena

original: dasahi ca balehi catūhi vesārajjehi aṭṭhārasahi buddhadhammehi chahi asādhāraṇehi
analyzed: dasahi ca balehi catūhi vesārajjehi aṭṭhārasahi buddha dhammehi chahi asādhāraṇehi

original: ñāṇehi, kevale ca buddhavisaye taṁ sandhāya bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: ñāṇehi kevale ca buddha visaye tam sandhāya bhaṇita

original: ‘ahamasmi …pe…
analyzed: aham asmi pe

original: sallakatto’ti.
analyzed: sallakatto ti

original: Idha, mahārāja, manussesu eko jātimā hoti, eko dhanavā, eko vijjavā, eko sippavā, eko sūro, eko vicakkhaṇo, sabbepete abhibhaviya rājāyeva tesaṁ uttamo hoti;
analyzed: idha mahā rāja manussesu ekaḥ jātimā hoti ekaḥ dhanavā ekaḥ vijjavā ekaḥ sippavā ekaḥ sūraḥ ekaḥ vicakkhaṇaḥ sabbe pete abhibhaviya rājāya iva tesam uttamaḥ hoti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, bhagavā sabbasattānaṁ aggo jeṭṭho seṭṭho.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja bhagavā sabba sattānam aggaḥ jeṭṭhaḥ seṭṭhaḥ

original: Yaṁ pana āyasmā bākulo appābādho ahosi, taṁ abhinīhāravasena, so hi, mahārāja, anomadassissa
analyzed: yam pana āyasmā bākulaḥ appābādhaḥ ahosi tam abhinīhāra vasena saḥ hi mahā rāja anomadassissa

original: bhagavato udaravātābādhe uppanne vipassissa ca bhagavato aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā ca bhikkhusatasahassānaṁ
analyzed: bhagavataḥ udara vāta ābādhe uppanne vipassissa ca bhagavataḥ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā ca bhikkhu sata sahassāna

original: tiṇapupphakaroge uppanne sayaṁ tāpaso samāno nānābhesajjehi taṁ byādhiṁ apanetvā
analyzed: tiṇapupphaka roge uppanne sayam tāpasaḥ samānaḥ nānā bhesajjehi tam byādhim apanetvā

original: appābādhataṁ patto, bhaṇito ca ‘etadaggaṁ …pe…
analyzed: patto bhaṇito ca etat aggam pe

original: bākulo’ti.
analyzed: bākulī iti

original: Bhagavato, mahārāja, byādhimhi uppajjantepi anuppajjantepi dhutaṅgaṁ ādiyantepi anādiyantepi natthi bhagavatā sadiso koci satto.
analyzed: bhagavataḥ mahā rāja byādhimhi uppajjante api an uppajjante pi dhutaṅgam ādiyante api an ādiyante pi natthi bhagavatā sadisaḥ koci satto

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja bhagavatā devātidevena saṁyuttanikāyavaralañchake—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā devātidevena sayutta nikāya vara lañchake

original: ‘Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā rūpino vā
analyzed: yāvatā bhikkhave sattāḥ apadāḥ vā dvipadāḥ vā catuppadāḥ vā bahuppadāḥ vā rūpinaḥ vā

original: arūpino vā saññino vā asaññino vā nevasaññīnāsaññino vā, tathāgato tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati
analyzed: arūpinaḥ vā saññinaḥ vā asaññinaḥ vā nevasaññīna asaññinaḥ vā tathāgataḥ tesam aggam akkhāyati

original: arahaṁ sammāsambuddho’”ti.
analyzed: araham sammāsambuddhaḥ iti

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Buddhaappābādhapañho tatiyo.
analyzed: buddha appābādha pañho tatiyo
